text.div:
Release Date: 2014-12-11

OID for code system: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.89

OID for value set: 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.10282 (this is the value set that includes the entire code system)

Description

A set of codes specifying whether and how the participant has attested his participation through a signature and or whether such a signature is needed.
Examples: A surgical Procedure act object (representing a procedure report) requires a signature of the performing and responsible surgeon, and possibly other participants. (See also: Participation.signatureText.)

LevelCodeDisplayDefinition
1I intended The particpant intends to provide a signature.
1S signed Signature has been affixed, either written on file, or electronic (incl. digital) signature in Participation.signatureText.
1X required A signature for the service is required of this actor.

name: v3 Code System ParticipationSignature
description:
A set of codes specifying whether and how the participant has attested his participation through a signature and or whether such a signature is needed.  Examples:
A surgical Procedure act object (representing a procedure report) requires a signature of the performing and responsible surgeon, and possibly other participants. (See also: Participation.signatureText.)

concept.definition: The particpant intends to provide a signature.
Signature has been affixed, either written on file, or electronic (incl. digital) signature in Participation.signatureText.
A signature for the service is required of this actor.
